body_html: Chainer's wrapper for cudnn LSTMs (L.NStepLSTM itself wrapping F.NStepLSTM) takes full advantage of cudnn's variable-length sequence support. But the wrapper is complex and fairly slow. Might be worth looking at for inspiration though @colesbury @adamlerer
